original: move=> Hin Hlocal. assert (Hn: n \in nodes) by (apply: pts_in). assert (Validj: valid (getLocal n (getStatelet j l))). move: (locCn C' Hn) => [Vj _]; exact: Vj. assert (Validi: valid (getLocal n (getStatelet i l))). move: (locCn C Hn) => [Vi _]; exact: Vi. move: (locCn C' Hn) => [Validj' Cohj]. move: (locCn C Hn) => [Validi' Coh]. assert (HeapForm: exists (s : PStateT) (lg : Log), getLocal n (getStatelet j l) = st :-> s \+ log :-> lg /\ getLocal n (getStatelet i l) = st :-> s \+ log :-> lg). by move: Cohj Coh; rewrite Hlocal. case: HeapForm => [s [lg [Hg Hj]]]. move/(@getStP_K _ _ C' Hin s lg): Hg => Pg. move/(@getStP_K _ _ C Hin s lg): Hj => Pi. by rewrite Pg Pi.
